typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Detalle Orden} as string,
		{Numero Orden} as integer,
		{Producto ID} as integer,
		{Linea Total} as float,
		Cantidad as decimal(10,0),
		Descuento as decimal(10,0),
		{Precio Unitario} as decimal(10,0),
		Ganancia as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExTLdetallesdeordenes
ExTLdetallesdeordenes keyGenerate(output(PK_detalledeordenes as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		Column_1 = {Detalle Orden},
		Column_2 = {Numero Orden},
		Column_3 = {Producto ID},
		Column_4 = {Producto ID},
		Column_5 = Cantidad,
		Column_6 = Descuento,
		Column_7 = {Precio Unitario},
		Column_8 = Ganancia,
		PK_detalledeordenes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_DetalleOrden as integer,
		PK_Order as integer,
		Detalle_Orden as string,
		Linea_Total as double,
		Cantidad as decimal(18,5),
		Descuento as decimal(5,5),
		Precio_Unitario as decimal(18,5),
		Ganancia as decimal(18,5),
		PK_Producto as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Almacenarproducto
